definition: forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount
to give an extra subsidy, or bonus etc/bonus/perquisite

sentences.english: Gathering frequent flyer miles is one of the perks of OCS travel.
sentences.chinese: 積累飛行里程是商務旅行的額外補貼之一。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, we cannot send other Test Report forms to you directly.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我們不能將額外的成績單直接寄給您本人。

sentences.english: All of this polling makes for a lot of extra work.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些輪詢都產生了許多額外的工作。

sentences.english: Second, I suggest you to take an additional course in some training center.
sentences.chinese: 其次，我建議你去培訓中心上額外的課程。

sentences.english: For an extra dose of antioxidants, have a glass of red wine on the side.
sentences.chinese: 爲了一個額外分量的抗氧化劑，另外再加一杯紅酒。

sentences.english: Then everything else you do is extra.
sentences.chinese: 然後其他你所做的事都是額外的。

sentences.english: He was interviewed during his visit to Japan this week.
sentences.chinese: 是趁著前兩天金範來日時，額外作的訪談。

sentences.english: Data events are used to emit additional data information.
sentences.chinese: 數據事件被用於發出額外的數據信息。

sentences.english: Additional heat energy is supplied with district heating utilizing geothermally heated water.
sentences.chinese: 額外的熱能由區域集中暖提供，採用地熱加熱的水。

sentences.english: As well as a blacksmith upgrade for purchasing additional war machines.
sentences.chinese: 而且鐵匠鋪可以升級以購買額外的戰爭機器。

sentences.english: The downside is that you’ll lose at least a few additional inches of ceiling height.
sentences.chinese: 缺點是你可能會額外的失去幾英寸的頭頂空間淨高。

sentences.english: I use a solid stick over it for extra coverage.
sentences.chinese: 我同時還使用棒狀額外再塗一層。

sentences.english: The contract contains options for additional payloads that would add to the initial award value.
sentences.chinese: 合同包含了可能會添加到最初授予價值的額外的載荷。

sentences.english: In fact, I seldom get an extra break in my workday.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，在工作日內我很少有額外的休息。

sentences.english: These were extra wedges in case they should be needed.
sentences.chinese: 這些額外的木楔是以防萬一的。

sentences.english: I can provide additional animation layers and videos to have this done.
sentences.chinese: 我可以提供額外的層和動畫影片有此完成。

definition: expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
to correspond/answering (one another)/to agree (among the part)/corresponding/relevant/appropriate/(modify) accordingly
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on
